Html:
I downloaded VS2010 - .Net Framework 4.0 Beta 2 and I don't see the Ribbon control.
It is absolutely incomprehensible, we have used the CTP version for one year and
now ribbon there isn't in WPF 4.0 !!! Why ?
(One year ago I was in Redmond and I heard a different thing....)
Microsoft have said the ribbon will ship separately to Visual Studio.
I agree, Ribbons should be included in WPF4
